title: VANILLA & CACAO-PEANUT BANANAICECREAM
directions: Take the frozen banana slices out of the freezer, thaw for a bit and prepare the two kinds of ice cream separately.
Add to a blender/food processor, blend for a few minutes until smooth and creamy.
Fill the jar (two jars for smaller portions) layer by layer with the two different kinds of banana ice cream.
Top with pomegranate seeds, berries and for some crunch, sprinkle some cacao nibs and crushed nuts on top
If you buy peanut butter, make sure to only buy the kind without added sugar and additional oils.
ingredients: 100 ml milk of choice, e.g. soy/almond/rice milk 1-2 tsp sweetener of choice, honey
100 ml milk of choice, e.g. soy/almond/rice milk 1 tbsp cacao powder
1 tbsp peanut butter, homemade/ sugar-free 1-2 tsp sweetener of choice, e.g. honey
crushed nuts of choice (peanuts, almonds etc.)
